commitResults.messageTitle: Renamed the filename to be YC and changed the bot name to YC. Added codes for greeting and exitting
Added Level 1-1 Echo
Added the list to store users' commands and ability to list out the commands.
Created the class Task for user input
Replaced the command list array to be class Task. Added the function of marking and unmarking tasks.
Added displayWelcomeMessage and displayByeMessage for printing the welcome and exit messages
Added the classes Deadline, Event, Todo for handling the respective tasks entry. Amended slightly the coding format.
Refactor and add separate methods for each cases at the end to make the if clauses more readable.
Created two classes of Exception to handle potential errors when running the code.
Added two more exception classes to handle invalid command or invalid index cases. Modified the message shown in EmptyEntryException
Added the error checking codes into the methods. Also, modifed the codes such that it is more fitting the coding standard and more organised.
Merge branch 'branch-Level-5'
Refined the Task class to remove unnecessary codes
Added the packages Exceptions and Tasks to store the respective classes.
Merge branch 'branch-A-Packages'
Refactored the main code.

Changed the commandList to an array list. Refined and made the commandList static so it can be accessed by the methods directly without needing to pass. Amended the method codes to use the methods of array list.
Added the deleteTask method. Renamed several methods to follow camelCase.

Added the methods saveTasks and loadTasks for level 7. Added the method toStorage for printing the displays of different task types. (Remark: Since I have made the commandList a static array list in level 6, I have changed the format here as well to prevent merge conflicts)
Merge branch 'branch-Level-6'
Solved the merge conflicts. Added level 7 methods, saveTasks and loadTasks, with conflicts solved.
Removed a repeated line that I overlooked previously
updated the event and deadline classes to ensure they are saved in correct format
